abstract: A new K-to-12 school in rural Mosca, Colo., offers plenty of natural daylight and other design features intended to create a better learning environment while reducing energy costs for the district.
snippet: A new K-to-12 school in rural Mosca, Colo., offers plenty of natural daylight and other design features intended to create a better learning environment while reducing energy costs for the district.

headline.main: From Oil and Gas Revenue, the Greenest of Schools
